channel.title: Inference — AI Newsletter
channel.description: The signal in the noise. Curated AI trends, tools, and research — updated every Monday.

item.title: OpenAI policy exec who opposed chatbot’s “adult mode” reportedly fired on discrimination claim
item.description: The executive has denied the allegation that she engaged in discrimination.
item.author: Lucas Ropek

item.title: Transformers.js v4 Preview: Now Available on NPM!
item.description: Transformers.js v4 Preview: Now Available on NPM!. This release signal from Hugging Face Blog looks practical enough for a scoped pilot.

item.title: GPU as a Service Pricing: A Complete Guide to Cost Models and Savings
item.description: In the fast-evolving world of cloud computing, GPU-as-a-service has become essential for handling intensive tasks such as AI training, machine learning inference, scientific simulations, and graphics rendering. Businesses and developers increasingly turn to these on-demand resources to avoid the high upfront costs of purchasing hardware.
item.author: Cyfuture AI

item.title: A Small-Scale System for Autoregressive Program Synthesis Enabling Controlled Experimentation
item.description: What research can be pursued with small models trained to complete true programs?
item.author: Russ Webb, Jason Ramapuram

item.title: awesome-ai-research-writing
item.description: Elevate your AI research writing, no more tedious polishing ✨. (5,379 stars, 417 forks) Only 12 days old with ~448 stars/day.
item.author: Leey21

item.title: A timeline of claims about AI/LLMs
item.description: A timeline of claims about AI/LLMs. This update from Hacker News is worth tracking for near-term product impact.

item.title: ChatGPT’s deep research tool adds a built-in document viewer so you can read its reports
item.description: OpenAI is updating ChatGPT's deep research tool with a full-screen viewer that you can use to scroll through and navigate to specific areas of its AI-generated reports. As shown in a video shared by OpenAI, the built-in viewer allows you to open ChatGPT's reports in a window separate from your chat, while showing a table.
item.author: Emma Roth

item.title: The two patterns by which agents connect sandboxes
item.description: Thank you to Nuno Campos from Witan Labs, Tomas Beran and Mikayel Harutyunyan from E2B, Jonathan Wall from Runloop, and Ben Guo from Zo Computer for their review and comments. TL;DR: More and more agents need a workspace: a computer where they can run code, install packages, and access.
item.author: Harrison Chase

item.title: NVIDIA Researchers Introduce KVTC Transform Coding Pipeline to Compress Key-Value Caches by 20x for Efficient LLM Serving
item.description: Serving Large Language Models (LLMs) at scale is a massive engineering challenge because of Key-Value (KV) cache management. As models grow in size and reasoning capability, the KV cache footprint increases and becomes a major bottleneck for throughput and latency. For modern Transformers, this cache can occupy multiple gigabytes.
item.author: Asif Razzaq

item.title: antigravity-awesome-skills
item.description: The Ultimate Collection of 700+ Agentic Skills for Claude Code/Antigravity/Cursor. Battle-tested, high-performance skills for AI agents including official skills from Anthropic and Vercel. (8,382 stars, 1,716 forks, Python) Created 27 days ago, averaging ~310 stars/day.
item.author: sickn33

item.title: No humans allowed: This new space-based MMO is designed exclusively for AI agents
item.description: SpaceMolt envisions a world where AI plays with itself and the humans just watch.
item.author: Kyle Orland

item.title: PaperBanana
item.description: PaperBanana: Automating Academic Illustration For AI Scientists. (3,286 stars, 161 forks, JavaScript) Only 12 days old with ~274 stars/day.
